method.name: hello
method.documentation: Says hello to the daemon.

argument.name: protocol_version
argument.documentation: The protocol version implemented by the client.

argument.name: client
argument.documentation: The client's name.

method.name: quit
method.documentation: Shuts down the daemon.

method.name: list_plugins
method.documentation: Retrieves the list of available plugins.

argument.name: plugin_type
argument.documentation: The type of plugins to retrieve.

method.name: stats
method.documentation: Retrieves statistics from the server.

broadcast.name: quit
broadcast.documentation: This broadcast is triggered when the daemon is shutting down.

return_value.documentation: The time in seconds that the daemon was running.

method.name: replace
method.documentation: Queries ids from a collection and replaces the playlist with the result.

argument.name: name
argument.documentation: The name of the playlist to replace.

argument.name: replacement
argument.documentation: The collection to query.

argument.name: action
argument.documentation: How to handle the current position after replacing the entries of the playlist. * XMMS_PLAYLIST_CURRENT_ID_FORGET resets the position to -1. * XMMS_PLAYLIST_CURRENT_ID_KEEP sets the current position to the last occurrence of the id of current position, or resets to -1 if id is not found. * XMMS_PLAYLIST_CURRENT_ID_MOVE_TO_FRONT moves the id of the current position to the beginning of the new playlist, or resets position to -1 if the id is not found.

method.name: set_next
method.documentation: Sets the playlist entry that will be played next.

argument.name: position
argument.documentation: The position of the playlist entry that will be played next (given as an absolute position).

return_value.documentation: The ID of the song at the new position of the playlist.

method.name: set_next_rel
method.documentation: Sets the playlist entry that will be played next.

argument.name: position_delta
argument.documentation: The position of the playlist entry that will be played next (given relative to the current position).

return_value.documentation: The ID of the song at the new position of the playlist.

method.name: add_url
method.documentation: Adds an URL to the given playlist.

argument.name: name
argument.documentation: The name of the playlist to which to add a URL.

argument.name: url
argument.documentation: The url to be added to the playlist.

method.name: add_collection
method.documentation: Adds the contents of a collection to the given playlist.

argument.name: name
argument.documentation: The name of the playlist to which to add the collection.

argument.name: collection
argument.documentation: The collection to be added to the playlist.

method.name: remove_entry
method.documentation: Removes an entry from the given playlist.

argument.name: name
argument.documentation: The playlist whose entry is to be removed.

argument.name: position
argument.documentation: The position of the entry to remove.

method.name: move_entry
method.documentation: Moves a playlist entry to a new position (absolute move).

argument.name: name
argument.documentation: The playlist whose entry is to be moved.

argument.name: position
argument.documentation: The current position of the entry to move.

argument.name: new_position
argument.documentation: The new position of the entry to move.

method.name: list_entries
method.documentation: Lists the contents of the given playlist.

argument.name: name
argument.documentation: The name of the playlist whose contents will be listed.

return_value.documentation: The IDs of the songs that make up the playlist.

method.name: current_pos
method.documentation: Retrieves the current position in the playlist with the given name.

argument.name: name
argument.documentation: The name of the playlist for which to retrieve the current position.

return_value.documentation: A dictionary containing the current position of the playlist and the name of the playlist.

method.name: current_active
method.documentation: Retrieves the name of the currently active playlist.

return_value.documentation: The name of the currently active playlist.

method.name: insert_url
method.documentation: Inserts an URL into the given playlist.

argument.name: name
argument.documentation: The name of the playlist into which the URL is to be inserted.

argument.name: position
argument.documentation: The playlist position to insert the URL.

argument.name: url
argument.documentation: The URL to be inserted into the playlist.

method.name: insert_collection
method.documentation: Inserts the contents of a collection into the given playlist.

argument.name: name
argument.documentation: The name of the playlist into which the collection is to be inserted.

argument.name: position
argument.documentation: The playlist position to insert the collection.

argument.name: collection
argument.documentation: The collection to be inserted into the playlist.

method.name: load
method.documentation: Loads the playlist with the given name.

argument.name: name
argument.documentation: The name of the playlist that will be loaded.

method.name: radd
method.documentation: Adds a directory recursively to the playlist with the given name.

argument.name: name
argument.documentation: The name of the playlist that will be modified.

argument.name: url
argument.documentation: The directory's URL.

method.name: rinsert
method.documentation: Insert a directory recursively into the playlist with the given name at the given position.

argument.name: name
argument.documentation: The name of the playlist that will be modified.

argument.name: position
argument.documentation: The position at which to insert the directory.

argument.name: url
argument.documentation: The directory's URL.

broadcast.name: changed
broadcast.documentation: This broadcast is triggered when the playlist changes.

return_value.documentation: A dictionary that describes the playlist that was changed.

broadcast.name: current_pos
broadcast.documentation: This broadcast is triggered when the position in the playlist changes.

return_value.documentation: The currently played song's media ID.

broadcast.name: loaded
broadcast.documentation: This broadcast is triggered when another playlist is loaded.

method.name: get_value
method.documentation: Retrieves the value of the config property with the given key.

argument.name: key
argument.documentation: The key of the config property to retrieve.

return_value.documentation: The value of the config property.

method.name: set_value
method.documentation: Sets the value of the config property with the given key.

argument.name: key
argument.documentation: The key of the config property to set.

argument.name: value
argument.documentation: The new value of the config property.

method.name: register_value
method.documentation: Registers a new config property for the connected client.

argument.name: key
argument.documentation: The key of the new config property.

argument.name: value
argument.documentation: The value of the new config property.

return_value.documentation: The full path of the config property that was registered.

method.name: list_values
method.documentation: Retrieves the list of known config properties.

return_value.documentation: The list of known config properties.

broadcast.name: value_changed
broadcast.documentation: This broadcast is triggered when the value of any config property changes.

return_value.documentation: A dictionary that maps the key of the config property to the new value of the config property.

method.name: start
method.documentation: Starts playback.

method.name: stop
method.documentation: Stops playback.

method.name: pause
method.documentation: Pauses playback.

method.name: tickle
method.documentation: Stops decoding of the current song. This will start decoding of the song set with the playlist_set_next command or the current song again if the playlist_set_next command wasn't executed.

method.name: playtime
method.documentation: Retrieves the current playtime.

method.name: seek_ms
method.documentation: Seeks to a position in the currently played song (given in milliseconds).

argument.name: offset
argument.documentation: The position in the song in milliseconds.

argument.name: whence
argument.documentation: Specifies how the absolute position in milliseconds is determined. If whence is XMMS_PLAYBACK_SEEK_SET, the argument is treated as an absolute value. If whence is XMMS_PLAYBACK_SEEK_CUR, the new position is computed by adding the argument to the current position.

method.name: seek_samples
method.documentation: Seeks to a position in the currently played song (given in samples).

argument.name: offset
argument.documentation: The position in the song in samples.

argument.name: whence
argument.documentation: Specifies how the absolute position in samples is determined. If whence is XMMS_PLAYBACK_SEEK_SET, the argument is treated as an absolute value. If whence is XMMS_PLAYBACK_SEEK_CUR, the new position is computed by adding the argument to the current position.

method.name: status
method.documentation: Retrieves the current playback status.

method.name: current_id
method.documentation: Retrieves the ID of the song that's currently being played.

return_value.documentation: The ID of the song that's currently being played.

method.name: volume_set
method.documentation: Changes the volume for the given channel.

argument.name: channel
argument.documentation: The name of the channel of which the volume is set.

argument.name: volume
argument.documentation: The new volume.

method.name: volume_get
method.documentation: Retrieves the volume of all available channels.

return_value.documentation: A dictionary that maps the volume channels to the current playback volume.

broadcast.name: status
broadcast.documentation: This broadcast is triggered when the playback status changes.

broadcast.name: volume_changed
broadcast.documentation: This broadcast is triggered when the playback volume changes.

return_value.documentation: A dictionary that maps the volume channels to the current playback volume.

broadcast.name: current_id
broadcast.documentation: This broadcast is triggered when the played song's media ID changes.

return_value.documentation: The currently played song's media ID.

method.name: get_info
method.documentation: Retrieves information about a medialib entry.

argument.name: id
argument.documentation: The ID of the medialib entry.

return_value.documentation: The information about the medialib entry.

method.name: import_path
method.documentation: Adds a directory recursively to the medialib.

argument.name: directory
argument.documentation: The directory to add to the medialib (given in URL encoding).

method.name: rehash
method.documentation: Rehashes the medialib. This will make sure that the data in the medialib is the same as the data in the files.

argument.name: id
argument.documentation: The ID of the song to rehash. If this is zero the whole medialib will be rehashed.

method.name: get_id
method.documentation: Retrieves the medialib ID that belongs to the given URL.

argument.name: url
argument.documentation: The URL to look for in the medialib.

return_value.documentation: The medialib ID associated with the URL.

method.name: remove_entry
method.documentation: Removes an entry from the medialib.

argument.name: id
argument.documentation: The ID of the medialib entry to remove.

method.name: set_property_string
method.documentation: Sets a medialib property to a string value.

argument.name: id
argument.documentation: The ID of the medialib entry to manipulate.

argument.name: source
argument.documentation: The source which is to set the medialib property (e.g. plugin/id3v2).

argument.name: key
argument.documentation: The key of the property to write.

argument.name: value
argument.documentation: The new value of the property.

method.name: set_property_int
method.documentation: Sets a medialib property to an integer value.

argument.name: id
argument.documentation: The ID of the medialib entry to manipulate.

argument.name: source
argument.documentation: The source which is to set the medialib property (e.g. plugin/id3v2).

argument.name: key
argument.documentation: The key of the property to write.

argument.name: value
argument.documentation: The new value of the property.

method.name: remove_property
method.documentation: Removes a propert from a medialib entry.

argument.name: id
argument.documentation: The ID of the medialib entry to manipulate.

argument.name: source
argument.documentation: The source which is to set the medialib property (e.g. plugin/id3v2).

argument.name: key
argument.documentation: The key of the property to remove.

method.name: move_entry
method.documentation: Updates the URL of a medialib entry that has been moved to a new location.

argument.name: id
argument.documentation: The ID of the medialib entry to move.

argument.name: url
argument.documentation: The new URL of the medialib entry.

method.name: add_entry
method.documentation: Add the given URL to the medialib.

argument.name: url
argument.documentation: The URL to add to the medialib.

broadcast.name: entry_added
broadcast.documentation: This broadcast is triggered when an entry is added to the medialib.

broadcast.name: entry_changed
broadcast.documentation: This broadcast is triggered when the properties of a medialib entry are changed.

broadcast.name: entry_removed
broadcast.documentation: This broadcast is triggered when a medialib entry is removed.

method.name: get
method.documentation: Retrieves the structure of a given collection.

argument.name: name
argument.documentation: The name of the collection to retrieve.

argument.name: namespace
argument.documentation: The namespace in which to look for the collection.

return_value.documentation: The collection structure if found, NULL otherwise.

method.name: list
method.documentation: Lists the collections in the given namespace.

argument.name: namespace
argument.documentation: The namespace to list collections from.

method.name: save
method.documentation: Save the given collection in the DAG under the given name in the given namespace.

argument.name: name
argument.documentation: The name under which to save the collection.

argument.name: namespace
argument.documentation: The namespace in which to save the collection.

argument.name: collection
argument.documentation: The collection structure to save.

method.name: remove
method.documentation: Remove the given collection from the DAG.

argument.name: name
argument.documentation: The name of the collection to remove.

argument.name: namespace
argument.documentation: The namespace where the collection to remove is.

method.name: find
method.documentation: Find all collections in the given namespace that contain a given media.

argument.name: id
argument.documentation: The id of the media.

argument.name: namespace
argument.documentation: The namespace in which to look for collections.

method.name: rename
method.documentation: Rename a collection in the given namespace.

argument.name: name
argument.documentation: The name of the collection to rename.

argument.name: new_name
argument.documentation: The new name of the collection.

argument.name: namespace
argument.documentation: The namespace to consider.

method.name: query
method.documentation: FIXME.

argument.name: collection
argument.documentation: FIXME.

argument.name: fetch
argument.documentation: Specifies what to fetch.

return_value.documentation: A return value as requested by fetch.

method.name: query_infos
method.documentation: FIXME.

argument.name: collection
argument.documentation: FIXME.

argument.name: limit_start
argument.documentation: FIXME.

argument.name: limit_length
argument.documentation: FIXME.

argument.name: properties
argument.documentation: The list of properties to be retrieved (may not be empty).

argument.name: group_by
argument.documentation: The list of properties to group by.

method.name: idlist_from_playlist
method.documentation: FIXME.

argument.name: url
argument.documentation: The URL of the playlist.

broadcast.name: changed
broadcast.documentation: This broadcast is triggered when a collection is changed.

return_value.documentation: A dictionary that describes the collection that was changed.

method.name: query_version
method.documentation: Retrieves the visualization version.

method.name: register
method.documentation: Registers a visualization client.

method.name: init_shm
method.documentation: FIXME.

argument.name: id
argument.documentation: The visualization client ID.

argument.name: shm_id
argument.documentation: FIXME.

method.name: init_udp
method.documentation: FIXME.

argument.name: id
argument.documentation: The visualization client ID.

method.name: set_property
method.documentation: Delivers one property.

argument.name: id
argument.documentation: The visualization client ID.

argument.name: key
argument.documentation: The property's key.

argument.name: value
argument.documentation: The property's value.

method.name: set_properties
method.documentation: Delivers one or more properties.

argument.name: id
argument.documentation: The visualization client ID.

argument.name: properties
argument.documentation: The properties to set.

method.name: shutdown
method.documentation: Shuts down the visualization client.

argument.name: id
argument.documentation: The visualization client ID.

broadcast.name: status
broadcast.documentation: This broadcast is triggered when the status of the mediainfo reader changes.

return_value.documentation: The current status of the mediainfo reader.

signal.name: unindexed
signal.documentation: Emits the number of unresolved medialib entries.

return_value.documentation: The number of unresolved medialib entries.

method.name: browse
method.documentation: Retrieves a list of paths available (directly) under the given path.

argument.name: url
argument.documentation: The path to browse.

method.name: retrieve
method.documentation: Retrieves a file from the server's bindata directory given the file's hash.

argument.name: hash
argument.documentation: The file's hash.

method.name: add
method.documentation: Adds binary data to the server's bindata directory.

argument.name: raw_data
argument.documentation: The data to add.

method.name: remove
method.documentation: Removes binary data from the server's bindata directory.

argument.name: hash
argument.documentation: The data's hash.

method.name: list
method.documentation: Retrieves a list of binary data hashes from the server's bindata directory.

method.name: sync
method.documentation: Save collections to disk.

method.name: send_message
method.documentation: Assemble and send a client-to-client message.

argument.name: to_client
argument.documentation: The destination client id.

argument.name: reply_policy
argument.documentation: The reply policy for this message

argument.name: payload
argument.documentation: The contents of the message.

method.name: reply
method.documentation: Assemble and send a reply to a client-to-client message

argument.name: message_id
argument.documentation: The id of the message.

argument.name: reply_policy
argument.documentation: The reply policy for this message.

argument.name: payload
argument.documentation: The contents of the reply.

method.name: get_connected_clients
method.documentation: Return a list of connected clients.

method.name: ready
method.documentation: Notify the server that the client's api is ready for query.

method.name: get_ready_clients
method.documentation: Return a list of clients ready for c2c communication

broadcast.name: ready
broadcast.documentation: This broadcast is emitted when a client's services are ready.

broadcast.name: client_connected
broadcast.documentation: This broadcast is emitted when a new client connects.

broadcast.name: client_disconnected
broadcast.documentation: This broadcast is emitted when a client disconnects.
